title: Consider Consistency
text: Consistent scales help in comparing data accurately, and exaggerating differences through scale can mislead the audience.

title: Uniformity Across Axes
text: Using different scales for each axis can distort the data representation because it is not consistent for both variable values.

title: Importance of Scale
text: Ignoring scale can lead to misinterpretation of the data, and scale is important to consider when creating visualizations.
